explanation: [0-0] A man and a woman are leaning on a bed, both covered with patterned quilts and pillows propped up behind them. The woman, wearing a black camisole, is looking at her phone, while the man, wearing a beige top, is looking at his phone and smiling. A Shiba Inu dog is lying on the bed licking its leg. There is black text at the top of the screen.

[0-6] The man yawns, covering his mouth with his left hand, then puts his phone to his right and says something to the woman as the subtitle "GOOD NIGHT" appears at the bottom of the screen. Then the man lies down on the pillow facing right, while the Shiba Inu looks up at him.

[6-15] Then the scene changes back to the two leaning on the bed playing with their phones, the man still smiling happily, the Shiba Inu lying on the bed. The woman yawns, covering her mouth with her right hand, puts her phone to her left, then takes the man's phone and puts it on her left as well. She then pulls the man's right hand, snuggles into his arms, and closes her eyes. The man, with a questioning look on his face, also closes his eyes.
